situation.title: Travelling around the CZ
situation.meta_description: Detailed description for traveling around the country.

content.processed:
Rules and Recommendations

There is a ban on the free movement of persons in the Czech Republic, which also applies to travel within our territory. But there are few exceptions. In general, you can travel to and from work, to visit family, to go shopping or to hospital and other social facilities. You can travel to the nature, the park or your own facilities (typically cottages, log cabins…). Trips to school and exams or a trip to leave the Czech Republic is also allowed.
